thread.title: I had expected a better reception!
thread.title_full: I had expected a better reception! - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ewaldbiemans
title: I had expected a better reception!
text:
This was my 4th visit to Temple Court and again my reservation could not be found and it took a while of back and forth until I was able to check in.
My request for a quiet room confirmed and I was give a room of a mile long hallway on the first floor nest to a stairway to the courtyard - I think it was room 160 or 150.
I could hear every sound in the hallway and the slamming of the exit to the courtyard door and a continuous periodic click of some equipment in the room. Not very conducive to a peaceful evening or night. There was no room to place my suitcase either. Service otherwise was ok, but housekeeping service was always late in the afternoon and after a day of work one prefers to return to a room that is made up.
I may consider a different hotel in the area for my next visit as a repeat visitor does not seem to do make it easier on the customer.
